mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id,target, order_num, url, menu_type, menu_key, menu_lay, visible, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_by, create_time from sys_menu
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, url, menu_type, target, menu_key, menu_lay , visible, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values ( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{url}, #{menuType}, #{target}, #{menuKey}, #{menuLay}, #{visible}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId} or parent_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select t.menu_id, t.parent_id, t.menu_name, t.order_num,t.target, t.url, t.menu_type, t.visible, t.perms, t.icon, t.remark, (select menu_name from sys_menu where menu_id = t.parent_id) parent_name from sys_menu t where t.menu_id = #{menuId}

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_key,m.menu_lay,m.url,m.target,m.visible, m.perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and length(m.menu_key)>0 order by m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.perms, m.menu_type,m.menu_key,m.menu_lay,m.target, m.icon, m.order_num,m.visible, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M','C') and ro.status = 0 and length(m.menu_key)>0 order by m.order_num
select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId}
